title: Initial Login
custom_preconds: Given a user is on an Android device
custom_steps:
When a user fresh installs Android At Bat for the first time
and is prompted with the paywall
and logs in with a single team entitled account
custom_expected: Then the user will receive the following message "You have successfully log in"

title: Ads
custom_preconds: Given a user is on an Android device
custom_steps:
When a user is in Android At Bat
and is logged in with a single team entitled account
and taps on different At Bat tabs
custom_expected: Then the user will see ad banners

custom_steps_separated.content: When a user taps on the Gameday Audio button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will have access to the Audio EPG
and will not be blocked by a paywall

custom_steps_separated.content:
via
Scoreboard (Audio button from expanded game cell)
Team Page (Audio button)
Audio EPG
(Check all three)
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the audio player will attempt to launch the Single Team's audio feed

custom_steps_separated.content: When the Single Team user attempts to launch the audio feed for the team that they are subscribed for
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the audio feed will start playing

custom_steps_separated.content: When the Single Team user attempts to launch the audio feed for the team currently facing their Single Team
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the audio feed will start playing

custom_steps_separated.content: When the Single Team user attempts to launch an audio feed from any other game (that their Single Team is not playing in)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the audio will feed will NOT start playing
and the user will see a "This feed is not included in your subscription" message

title: MLB.TV Away Feed
custom_preconds: Given a user is on an Android device
custom_steps:
When a user is logged in with a single team entitled account (Team A)
and taps on the MLB.TV EPG button
and taps on game with Team A as away team
and taps on the away feed

title: MLB.TV Home Feed
custom_preconds: Given a user is on an Android device
custom_steps:
When a user is logged in with a single team entitled account (Team A)
and taps on the MLB.TV EPG button
and taps on game with Team A as home team
and taps on the home feed

title: MLB.TV Button in Stream
custom_preconds: Given a user is on an Android device

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user is logged in with single team account (Team A)
and is viewing stream for Team A
and taps on the MLB.TV feed selector button
and taps to access the other feed
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the feed will NOT play
and the user will see the following message: "You need an active MLB.TV subscription to view this game. MLB.TV Single Team subscribers, select your team's broadcast from the MLB.TV Program Guide. If you have questions, please view our FAQ."
with a link to the FAQ
Then the user will be taken to the app FAQ page

title: Local (In-market) Blackout
custom_preconds: Given a user is on an Android device
custom_steps:
When a user is logged in with a single team entitlement (Team A)
and taps on a local blackout feed for Team A
custom_expected:
Then the user will receive a 'Blackout Restriction' message 
and the feed will NOT play

title: National Blackout
custom_preconds: Given a user is on an Android device
custom_steps:
When a user is logged in with a single team entitlement (Team A)
and the user taps on a National broadcast feed
custom_expected:
Then the user will receive a 'Blackout Restriction' message 
and the feed will NOT play

title: Single team feed available, not selected
custom_preconds: Given a user is on an Android device
custom_steps:
When a user is logged in with a single team entitled account (Team A)
and taps on MLB.TV EPG button
and views Team A @ Team B game
and taps on the Team B feed
custom_expected: Then the user will see the message: "You need an active MLB.TV subscription to view this game. MLB.TV Single Team subscribers, select your team's broadcast from the MLB.Tv program guide. If you have questions, please view our FAQ."

title: Archive feed for subscribed team
custom_preconds: Given a user is on an Android device
custom_steps:
When a user is logged in with a single team entitled account (Team A)
and taps on the MLB.TV button
and taps back to access an archive feed for Team A
custom_expected: Then the user is able to access the archive feed
